name: REBOUND (itch) (waza_Dev)
description:
Made for AfricaComicade game jam in less than 24 hours

You Left click to dash, touching enemys hurts you but dashing into walls gives you immunity and allows you to hurt them

You can pick up power ups  like a speedBoost,Health Boost and 'A murder all thing'

By: WAZA BANDA (ZAMBIA)
